name: [PDF] Series IVwarwick.ac.uk › sci › oleg_zaboronski › analysisi › notes-ma131_ch10
description: Theorem Riemann's Rearrangement Theorem Suppose ∑ an is a conditionally convergent series. Then for every real number s there is a rearrangement (bn) of (an) such that ∑ bn = s.
